item.title: Wim Remes (@wimremes) for (ISC)2 Board of Directors
item.description: I am way late to the game on this, but if you have a blog, a twitter handle, or even better (in this specific case) a CISSP, please support Wim Remes (@wimremes), as he has submitted to become a member of the (ISC)2 Board of Directors. On twitter use the hashtag: #wim4board Lets help the certifications, especially the one with so much corporate/gov acceptance, get better. His petition: http://blog.remes-it.be/petition.html Other supporters:
